Class dominoes.InvalidPlayException 

java.lang.Object

                   +----dominoes.InvalidPlayException
public class InvalidPlayException
extends Exception
This class represents an error while trying to play a bone on the table. It is a simple extension of the java.lang.Exception class.

InvalidPlayException(String)
Create the exception with an error message

InvalidPlayException 
  public InvalidPlayException(String message)
Create the exception with an error message
Parameters:
message - the error message for the exception
